interpretation: The Santa Claus card represents the spirit of giving and generosity. It is a reminder to be generous with our time, resources, and love. This card also embodies the idea of tradition, and the importance of honoring and preserving our cultural customs. When this card appears in a reading, it may suggest that the querent should focus on giving and sharing with others, or that they should be open to receiving help and support from those around them. It may also indicate that the querent is feeling nostalgic or sentimental about the past, and that they should take time to honor their personal traditions and values. Ultimately, the Santa Claus card encourages us to embrace the joy of giving and to spread kindness and goodwill to all those around us.
